dir.description: The reading direction of submenus when applicable. If omitted, inherits globally from DirectionProvider or assumes LTR (left-to-right) reading mode.
dir.description_zh: 子菜单的阅读方向（如果适用）。如果省略，则全局继承自 DirectionProvider 或采用 LTR（从左到右）读取模式。

modal.description: The modality of the context menu. When set to true, interaction with outside elements will be disabled and only menu content will be visible to screen readers.
modal.description_zh: 上下文菜单的模式。设置为 true 时，将禁用与外部元素的交互，并且屏幕阅读器只能看到菜单内容。
